titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Earle of VVarwick, Lord High Admirall of England: in answer of a scandalous pamphlet, falsly reflecting upon his Lordships honour and proceedings. Published by speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iohn Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old Bailey,

notesStmt.note: A reply to the anonymous: The declaration and resolution of Robert Earle of Warwick, Lord Admirall for the King, Parliament of England, and all the officers, and sea-men a boord, his navie touching the personall treaty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bailey
